name: City Hotels Rūdninkai
description: City Hotels Rūdninkai no reception hotel located directly on Vilnius’s Old Town, City Hotels Rūdninkai is only 500 metres from the Gate of Dawn. The unique old Vilnius defensive wall merges with one of the hotel's walls and encircles the backyard. The rooms feature a modern interior design done in light natural colours and wooden furniture. Each has a TV set with satellite channels and scenic views of the area, as well as a work desk and private bathroom. The City Hotels Rūdninkai's restaurant, Belgai, serves Belgian dishes. In the warm seasons guests can have their meals on the courtyard. It also boasts a large selection of Belgian beers. Vilnius’s Town Hall is located within 350 metres. The Central Railway Station is 650 metres from City Hotels Rūdninkai. The Vilna Gaon Jewish State Museum is 500 metres away.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Vilnius City Center
description: Travel brilliantly at Courtyard Vilnius City Center. Our new, four-star hotel is set in the business district of Vilnius, Lithuania overlooking the famous landmark, Gediminas' Castle. We are ideally positioned just steps away from the medieval Old Town, business centers and local attractions. Our hotel offers 199 spacious, stylish rooms (some with lovely Old Town and cathedral views), featuring a mini-fridge, complimentary Wi-Fi, sleek bathrooms, cable/satellite/streaming TV and hot buffet breakfast.Enter your room conveniently using a mobile key. Stop by Solt Dining for delicious local and global cuisine and cocktails, or enjoy terrace dining with spectacular castle views. Visit The Market for a quick bite to go, or take a drink in our Lobby Bar. Unwind in our state-of-the-art fitness center. Those planning a meeting or function in Vilnius will appreciate our four sophisticated venues, catering services and tech-enabled media pods in our ultra-modern lobby.Marriott

name: Loop Hotel Vilnius
address: Dariaus ir Girėno g. 21, Vilnius LT-02189
description: Situated in 1 km from Vilnius International Airport, Loop Hotel Vilnius is a design hotel offering 4-star accommodation. Free WiFi is available and on-site parking is provided at surcharge. Set in a renovated factory building, all rooms of Loop Hotel Vilnius are air-conditioned and feature a desk. Some of the rooms have a split-level loft layout. The private bathrooms are fitted with a shower or bath. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the property. The on-site restaurant Fat Cloud serves European cuisine. Guests can also prepare their own meals in the shared kitchen. A gym is featured at the property. The design hotel also offers several lounge areas throughout the property, including two atriums. Guests can also use the self-service laundry and ironing rooms. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Loop Hotel Vilnius. Central Vilnius is located 3 km away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Vilnius City Centre
description: Welcome to Hilton Garden Inn Vilnius City Centre, set in the central area of the city, 15 minutes from Vilnius International Airport. Our excellent location on the Gediminas avenue is surrounded by numerous corporate office buildings, government institutions, entertainment and shopping. Local attractions include the medieval Old Town, Litexpo fair ground and the Exhibition and Congress Centre, all within walking distance. Start the morning with a delicious buffet breakfast. Our contemporary a la carte restaurant is open all day featuring a terrace and cozy bar. We also offer Evening Room Service, and The Shop is open 24 hours for refreshments. Work out in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center. Along with a 24-hour Business Center, we have over 1,900 sq. ft. of versatile meeting space that’s perfect for corporate and social events.Hilton

name: Amberton Cathedral Square Hotel Vilnius
description: Amberton is a self-managed property located in the heart of Vilnius’s Old Town, just a few steps from Cathedral Square. It offers air conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TVs, work desks and a free internet connection. The rooms of the Amberton feature a classic interior design with bright walls and wooden furniture. All have a safe and a minibar. Each private bathroom includes a hairdryer and either a bath or a shower. The restaurant serves European dishes and offers views of the cathedral. A Breakfast buffet is available in the restaurant in the mornings. The outdoor café is open during the summer season. Guests at Amberton Cathedral Square Hotel Vilnius can use electric scooters for free. Hot-air balloon rides are available with advance reservation at the property. The main shopping avenue of Vilnius is only 30 metres from the Amberton. The Palace of the Grand Dukes of Lithuania is 200 metres away. Many cafés, restaurants and shops are nearby.

name: Conti Hotel
description: Located in Vilnius, less than 1 km from Bastion of the Vilnius Defensive Wall, Conti Hotel provides accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 1.9 km from Museum of Occupations and Freedom Fights. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms come with a kitchen with a stovetop. At Conti Hotel each room has bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Lithuanian National Opera and Ballet Theatre, Gediminas' Tower and Vilnius Choral Synagogue. The nearest airport is Vilnius International Airport, 5 km from Conti Hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Royal Astorija Hotel, Vilnius
description: Built in 1901, Radisson Collection Astorija Hotel is located in the heart of the old town of Vilnius and it offers an indoor swimming pool and a fitness room. All major sights are within easy walking distance. Radisson Collection Astorija Hotel offers free WiFi access in the entire hotel. All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a TV with cable channels and a minibar, as well as a bathroom. The exclusive restaurant Astorija Brasserie serves modern French cuisine. It overlooks the town square and St. Casimir's Church. There is also Astorija Bar where guests can relax with a drink and admire the views. A rich buffet breakfast is served in the mornings, but guests with early departure times are offered the Grab & Run takeaway breakfast. At surcharge, guests can benefit from 3-Hour Express Laundry service, as all clothes handed in before 20:00 will be returned the same day. The bus and train station is 1 km away from Radisson Collection Astorija Hotel. The airport is 6 km away.

name: Hotel Vilnia
description: Set in the 19th-century building in Vilnius, Hotel Vilnia is a 3-minute walk from Gediminas' Tower and offers a lounge bar. The property is situated next to the Vilnia River, 1 km from Lithuanian National Opera and Ballet Theatre and 1.4 km from Museum of Genocide Victims. The on-site restaurant serves local cuisine. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and feature heated floors. Every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries. The units include a desk. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. For guests' convenience, Hotel Vilnia has a business centre. Speaking English, Lithuanian and Russian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St Anne's Church, Amber Museum-Gallery in Vilnius and Palace of the Grand Dukes of Lithuania. The nearest airport is Vilnius Airport, 5 km from Hotel Vilnia.

name: Congress Avenue Hotel
description: The 4-star Congress Avenue Hotel is centrally located on Vilnius’ main street, Gedimino Avenue, only a few steps from the National Theatre and Government Palace. It offers a breakfast. All air-conditioned rooms of Congress Avenue Hotel offer an LCD TV with satellite and cable channels, as well as a bathroom complete with a hairdryer and either a bath or a shower. Some provide a balcony. At the reception of the property, guests can book city tours or buy tickets for the nearby National Opera and Ballet Theatre. There is a terrace on the top floor of the hotel, where guests can enjoy views of the city. The Cathedral of Vilnius is a 5-minute walk away. All main shops as well as the finest bars and restaurants are located in the immediate proximity of Congress Avenue Hotel.

name: Comfort Hotel LT - Rock 'n' Roll Vilnius
description: Just 700 meters from Vilnius Central Station and a ten minute walk from the city charming Old Town district, Comfort Hotel LT is a perfect base for exploring Vilnius. The hotel is just 10 minutes away from the airport. With 200 great rooms, a modern restaurant and bar, four inspirational meeting rooms and a 24-hour gym, there is little doubt that Comfort Hotel LT is bringing something new to the Vilnius hotel scene.Choice Hotels

name: City Gate
description: Conveniently located in the Vilnius’s Old Town, City Gate is only 100 metres from the Gate of Dawn. It offers rooms with 37-inch flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Free private parking is available. The air-conditioned rooms of the City Gate feature a classical interior design with wooden furniture and bright walls. Each has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and either a bath or a shower. Rich buffet breakfast is served in the mornings. The City Gate’s staff is available 24 hours a day and provides tourist information. Guests can rent a car directly at the hotel. Luggage storage is also provided. The city’s Town Hall is located 500 metres from the hotel. The Presidential Palace is within 1.1 km away. The Vilnius’s main railway and bus stations are within 700 metres and the airport is 6 km away.

name: Old Town Trio Hotel
description: Featuring free WiFi and a restaurant, Old Town Trio offers accommodation in Vilnius, 800 metres from Bastion of the Vilnius Defensive Wall. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms include a seating area for your convenience. Rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge and gift shop at the property. Gediminas' Tower is 1.5 km from Old Town Trio, while Lithuanian National Opera and Ballet Theatre is 1.6 km away. Vilnius Airport is 4 km from the property.

name: Amicus Hotel
description: Amicus Hotel is a family-run modern hotel, conveniently located close to the Vilnius Airport, yet in a quiet place surrounded by the greenery. It offers accommodation with free internet access and private parking. The rooms at Amicus are bright and feature wooden furniture. Each comes with a TV, a telephone and a private bathroom with toiletries. Buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel’s spacious restaurant which specialises in European cuisine. In the summer season guests can dine and enjoy their drinks on the terrace outside. Amicus Hotel offers 24-hour front desk and room service. Guests can relax in a sauna or order a massage. The hotel’s staff speak Lithuanian, Russian, English, German and Polish and are happy to help guests with organising car rental or sightseeing tours of the city. Amicus Hotel is 2 km from the Vilnius Train Station and the city centre is about 3.5 km away. The southern bypass of Vilnius, the A3 motorway, is a 3-minute drive from the hotel. It is 2 km to IKEA Shopping Centre and 5 km to Lithuanian Exhibition and Congress Centre LITEXPO

name: Hotel Rinno
description: The elegant, 3 plus-star Hotel Rinno is situated on the quiet Vingriu Street close to the Synagogue in Vilnius' Old Town. It features classically decorated rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. All rooms at the Rinno are decorated with warm, sandy colours. Each comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some offer a minibar. Guided tours can be arranged upon request. A pick-up service from the Vilnius International Airport, which is 6 km away, is available. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast, including traditional choices as well as cooked-on-request omelettes. The on-site bar is open 24 hours a day. Guests are offered complimentary tea and coffee. Hotel Rinno is only a 10-minute walk from the bus/train station and the City Hall. Public parking is possible on site (reservation is not needed) and charges are applicable.

name: Neringa Hotel
description: Only a 5-minute walk from Gediminas Castle and the old town of Vilnius, Hotel Neringa offers 124 bright air-conditioned rooms, a traditional restaurant, a lobby bar and a basement bar. Wi-fi is available in all rooms and public spaces and is free of charge. Garage parking can be used at an extra cost (reservation is required). The Neringa’s rooms feature a large working desk, a minibar, a safe, a flat screen TV with satellite channels, an ironing set and coffee-tea making facilities, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Classic Lithuanian cuisine and international dishes are served in the historic ambience of the Neringa restaurant. Guests can exercise in hotel‘s gym (free of charge). The Neringa is directly located on Gedimino Avenue, the main street of Vilnius. All major sights are within easy walking distance. Vilnius Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Artagonist Art Hotel
description: Artagonist Art hotel is set in an authentic 15th century building in the Old Town of Vilnius. Rooms are decorated with handmade artworks by Lithuanian artists. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. Ironing equipment is available upon request. The hotel reception, restaurant and bar are decorated with paintings, murals, art installations and sculptures. Guests are invited to savour meals in the Amandus restaurant offering unexpected combinations of flavor, as well as dine in the lobby from the A La Carte menu or have a drink in the bar, while enjoying a view of Pilies street. There is a 24-hour front desk. Hotel is a 3-minute walk away from the Town Hall Square, St. John Church and the Cathedral Square. The distance to the bus and train station is 3 km, while to Vilnius airport it is 7 km. Lithuanian Exhibition and Congress Centre LITEXPO can be reached within 4.2 km.

name: Vilnius Grand Resort
description: Vilnius Grand Resort is set among 280 hectares of verdant countryside and sprawling by pine and birch forest. The hotel features free WiFi, a large, heated indoor swimming pool, steam baths and saunas. The hotel offers well-appointed rooms as well as luxurious suites. Most of them have an LCD TV with interactive programming. Guests can relax in the V SPA Wellness centre, with 2 spa areas Aqua and Vitality. Aqua spa area features a swimming pool, kids pool with a water slide, sauna, steam bath and a hot tub. Vitality pool area comes with cascades, grotto, outside and inside hot tub, steam bath, Finnish and Russian saunas and relaxation rooms. Please note that Vitality pool area is adults only. There is also a tennis court and the hotel is surrounded by a magnificent 18-hole championship golf course - the V Golf Club. There are 2 restaurants on site. Vilnius Grand Resort offers classic European dishes with a French accent. Vilnius Grand Resort is only a 20-minute drive from the centre of Vilnius. A complimentary shuttle bus is available.

name: Urbihop Hotel
description: Located only 2 km from Shopping center Akropolis and 6 km from Vilnius city centre and Old Town, Urbihop Hotel offers free WiFi and wide parking area. Featuring individual designs, each guest room features a flat-screen TV and air-conditioning. Restaurant “U” offers a variety of international meals prepared from seasonal and local products. A breakfast buffet of hot and cold dishes is served every morning and guests can ask for breakfast a la carte menu for specific requests. 24/7 Lobby Bar will provide guests with snacks and drinks throughout the day. Reception is open over the clock and Urbihop Hotel boasts various conference rooms and different facilities for meetings. The hotel is located in the same building as SEB Arena, which is suited for various sport and recreation activities. Football area Sportima and events arena Utenos Arena are located nearby.

name: Shakespeare Boutique Hotel
description: The stylish 4-star Shakespeare Boutique Hotel is housed in a renovated 17th-century palace in the heart of Vilnius, 50 metres from the Cathedral Square. It offers individually designed rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel interiors are filled with antiques, art works and books. All beautifully decorated rooms at the Shakespeare are dedicated to different famous authors. Each comes with air conditioning, tea and coffee-making facilities and a small library. The elegant on-site Sonnets Restaurant specialises in gourmet and Lithuanian dishes. Guests can enjoy a wide selection of wine and malt whiskey at the Globe Bar or on the terrace. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange dry cleaning and laundry services. Luggage storage and free on-site parking are provided. The hotel is the recipient of the 2008, 2010, 2011 Vilnius Hospitality Award. Shakespeare Boutique Hotel is located within 300 metres of the most popular attractions, the Gediminas Tower, the Presidential Palace and Vilnius University.

name: Ratonda Centrum Hotels
description: The 4-star Ratonda Centrum Hotel is situated at the Vilnius’ main street, a 15-minute walk from the Old Town. This family-run, boutique hotel offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a minibar at an extra cost. All rooms at the Ratonda Centrum are bright and classically furnished. Each comes with a flat-screen TV, work space and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Some offer a seating area. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel’s elegant restaurant, which specialises in European dishes. The on-site fitness centre features a sauna and a small gym. The sauna can be booked privately for an additional price. Front desk staff is at guests’ disposal 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information. The reception area features designer furniture and it is decorated with works of art by Lithuanian artists. Guarded parking is available nearby at an additional cost. Ratonda Centrum Hotel is situated 250 metres from the Lithuanian Parliament, the Seimas. The popular Lukiskes Square is just a 4-minute walk from the hotel.

name: ibis Styles Vilnius
description: In ibis Styles Vilnius hotel everything is designed with the guest's well-being in mind, offering more modernity, style and comfort. Brand new ibis Styles Vilnius Hotel offers 92 comfortable rooms. Located only 5 min to City Center and Vilnius Airport, ib is Styles Vilnius Hotel is easy accessible for all travelling by plane, train, bus or car. Hotel has lobby bar, restaurant and 3 conference halls. Hotel provides free parking.accorhotels.com

name: Corner Hotel
description: The Corner Hotel is a modern 150 room hotel, located in central part of Vilnius, just a 15-minute walking distance from the Old Town. It offers soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, seating area and free Wi-Fi access. The Corner Hotel boasts modern rooms, renovated in 2017-2019. All units are equipped with air conditioning, coffee/tea making facilities, a fridge, a flat screen TV, free WiFi. Private WC offers a shower and a hairdryer. Restaurant Element serves great breakfast. Lunch and dinner may be served upon request. There are 4 modern conference halls for meetings and events. Reception is open 24/7. There is also a laundry and an ironing room in the hotel. Vilnius’s Central railway and bus station is 2.3 km from the Corner Hotel and can be reached by some convenient public and private transport options. Vilnius Airport is located in 4 km, and there is a supermarket within 50 metres of the Corner. The Vilna Gaon Jewish State Museum is 900 metres away.

name: Grotthuss Boutique Hotel
description: Grotthuss Boutique Hotel Vilnius is a small hotel located in the heart of Vilnius’ Old Town. It offers rooms with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and free WiFi. Public parking is available. The rooms of the Grotthuss feature a stylish and traditional interior design that fits the hotel’s historic roots. All have a safe, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath, shower and a hairdryer. All rooms are equipped with a variety of original features, such as ceiling decoration and paintings by Lithuanian painters. Phone multi-chargers are available in all rooms. The Town Hall is only 350 metres from the hotel, and the Gate of Dawn is within 650 metres. Vilnius’s main railway station is 800 metres away. The La Pergola Restaurant is located in the winter garden. It offers a wide range of high-quality Italian, Spanish and French wines and gourmet dishes. In the mornings a breakfast buffet is available.

name: Holiday Inn Vilnius
description: Central Vilnius hotel with elegant event rooms and a fitness center. Holiday Inn® Vilnius hotel is in the city center, a short walk from the Old Town. Vilnius International Airport (VNO) is half an hour’s drive away. The hotel is walking distance from the Old Town’s attractions. You can take in a performance at the ``Lithuanian National Opera and Ballet Theater`` or visit the nearby ``Palace of the Grand Dukes of Lithuania`` and the imposing Gothic ``St. Anne’s Church``. Buses run to city destinations from the stop outside the hotel. You can host meetings for up to 250 people in the hotel’s 6 naturally lit conference rooms, all with state-of-the-art facilities. IBM’s offices are right next door, and other major businesses, such as Microsoft, are based nearby. At this hotel you can enjoy: Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel A fitness center A Business Center with 2 computers and printing facilities On-site parking for an additional fee The hotel’s stylish rooms come with air-conditioning and pillow menus so you can enjoy a good night’s sleep. Wake up to a hearty hot buffet breakfast in the ``Rib Room`` restaurant, and enjoy international menus featuring a selection of signature rib dishes. Join friends and colleagues in the refined, light-filled ``Lobby Bar`` to chat over cocktails or single malt whiskies from the extensive collection.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: ibis Vilnius Centre
description: Experience the ultimate convenience at ibis Vilnius Centre.Our smile team will always look forward to make your stay most comfortable.Take advantage of the Hotel offers:an inviting restaurant and bar areas,cozy corner with charming little things for your kids,our uniquely crafted Sweet Beds for a good night's rest,a rich variety of options for breakfast,modernly equipped meeting facilities,pet-friendly policy and free Wi-Fi. We always keep our rates at a budget-friendly level! You will want to come back!accorhotels.com

name: Airinn Vilnius Hotel
description: AirInn Vilnius Hotel is situated on the grounds of Vilnius International Airport, just 50 metres from the main terminal, offering a view of the airport runway from some rooms. It features a sauna, sports facilities and its own, guarded parking, as well as free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms feature elegant furniture as well as a private bathroom and a TV. Traditional Lithuanian and European cuisine is served in the restaurant and there also is a 24-hour lobby bar with a fireplace and a large, flat-screen TV. Room service is available. The centre of Vilnius is about 6 km away from AirInn Vilnius Hotel, The Old Town is 5 km away and Vilnius Bus and Train Stations are 3 km from the hotel.

name: Crowne Plaza Vilnius
description: Location This hotel lies in the centre of Vilnius, close to ‘Vingis’ park. It is ideal for both business and leisure travellers. The hotel is in the vicinity of the parliament, the embassies and all major government and business institutions. The old town with its museums, art galleries, cinemas, nightclubs and shopping centres can be easily reached on foot. The hotel can be reached quickly and easily from Vilnius International Airport some 8 km away, and is approximately 5 km from the train station. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 108 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A newspaper stand is also among the amenities at the establishment. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Guests can also use the bicycle storage facilities. Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. The carpeted accommodation units feature a double bed or a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. The rooms offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. Additional amenities include an ironing set and a trouser press. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone and a TV. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers an indoor pool. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. Active guests have various leisure options to choose from, including a gym, a spa, a sauna, a steam bath and massage treatments. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, B & B, half board and full board. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Baltazaras
description: Located in Vilnius, the new and modernly equipped Hotel Baltazaras is nearby the most popular shopping and entertainment centers. You can access free WiFi in all areas. Each room here will provide you with flat-screen cable TV, air conditioning and a seating area. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Spa facilities are available for hotel guests with a 20% discount, when prearranged. The hotel is 5.5 km from The Museum of Genocide Victims, 5.5 km from The Lithuanian National Opera and Ballet Theatre and 6.5 km from Lithuanian Exhibition and Convention Centre LITEXPO. Vilnius Airport is 10 km away.

name: Narutis Hotel
description: Located on the main street of Vilnius’s Old Town, The Narutis Hotel features 2 restaurants. Internet and parking are free of charge. Each air-conditioned room is individually decorated with unique frescoes, wall paintings, and original 16th-century ceilings. All rooms overlook the old town. The rooms feature a minibar, flat-screen satellite TV, and a bathroom with hairdryer. The elegant Narutis Restaurant offers Lithuanian and international dishes and a selection of fine wines. The staff is available 24/7 and provides tourist information. All major sights of Vilnius, including Gediminas Tower, the Cathedral and the Presidential Palace, are within 500 metres.

name: Green Vilnius Hotel
description: Located in a quiet part of Vilnius, 5 km from Litexpo Centre, Green Vilnius Hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Free private parking is available. All rooms of the Green Vilnius feature an elegant interior design with bright walls and carpeted floors. Each has a modern bathroom with a shower and a work desk. The Vilnius centre is 5 km from the Green Vilnius and is easily accessible through public transportation. The nearest bus stop is only 200 metres away. The hotel’s front desk is open 24 hours a day. Guests can rent a car directly from the hotel, which also organises a shuttle service. In the mornings a breakfast buffet is available in the restaurant, which offers a selection of European dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.

name: Art Hotel Moon Garden
description: Boasting a terrace, Moon Garden is situated in the centre of Vilnius, 600 metres from Bastion of the Vilnius Defensive Wall. Built in 19th century, this 4-star hotel is within 2.2 km of Museum of Occupations and Freedom Fights and 1.9 km of Gediminas' Tower. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms also boast a kitchenette with a stovetop. At Moon Garden the rooms have bed linen and towels. A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include The Gates of Dawn, Vilnius Choral Synagogue and Vilnius Gaon Jewish State Museum. The nearest airport is Vilnius International Airport, 5 km from Moon Garden.

name: Imperial Hotel & Restaurant
description: Located directly on Vilnius’s Old Town, luxurious Imperial Hotel & Restaurant offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free WiFi. The independent boutique property is set in a 16th century building that was completely renovated in 2005, and features rooms with Old Town and courtyard views. The rooms of Imperial Hotel & Restaurant have a traditional interior design inspired by that of the early 19th century. All are soundproofed and have a safe, minibar and a coffee machine. Each boasts a private bathroom with slippers, bathrobes and free branded toiletries, some feature a free-standing bathtub. The bathrooms feature wooden floors. The fine dining restaurant Imperial serves international and Lithuanian dishes. The California Tapas & Wine bar serves drinks and light snacks. In the mornings Champagne Breakfast with freshly squeezed orange juice is available. In summer the courtyard features outdoor seating for the restaurant. All guests receive a welcome drink at the bar. The staff is available 24/7. For guests convenience a cash machine and luggage storage are available on site. Vilnius’s main railway station is within 1.1 km. The Presidential Palace is 750 metres away, and the Town Hall is 160 metres from Imperial Hotel & Restaurant.

name: Grand Hotel Kempinski Vilnius
description: Set in Vilnius, 400 metres from Gediminas' Tower, Grand Hotel Kempinski Vilnius provides accommodation with a fitness centre and a spa & wellness centre. A hot tub is available for guests, along with a sauna. The property is situated in the Vilnius Old Town district and Lithuanian National Opera and Ballet Theatre is 700 metres away. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Grand Hotel Kempinski Vilnius features some rooms that include a balcony, and rooms are equipped with a coffee machine. Guest rooms are equipped with a seating area. A continental breakfast is served each morning at the property. There is an on-site restaurant, which serves International cuisine. The accommodation offers a terrace. Speaking English and Lithuanian, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Popular points of interest near Grand Hotel Kempinski Vilnius include Bastion of the Vilnius Defensive Wall, Cathedral Square and Palace of the Grand Dukes of Lithuania. The nearest airport is Vilnius Airport, 5 km from the property.

name: Best Western Vilnius
description: Best Western Vilnius is located on the right side of the river Neris in the up-and-coming business district at a walking distance to the Old Town. Bright and modern interior, comfortable rooms, cozy restaurant, business, and fitness centers are the right choice for business visitors as well as leisure individuals and groups. Newly renovated Best Western Vilnius offers 114 cozy and stylish rooms, including four luxury rooms and one apartment with private sauna. All rooms equipped with air-conditioning, queen-size bed, work desk, direct dial telephone, wireless Internet access, mini bar, bathroom with hair dryer, satellite TV & Pay TV. The price also includes solid breakfast buffet. During morning hours, you can appreciate our exercise facility for free with exercise equipment, sauna, and swimming pool. Combine your stay with shopping in the modern mall and entertainment centers near the hotel, with a romantic candlelight dinner in the hotel restaurant Europa Classic. Come to enjoy Best Western Vilnius hospitality! Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Park Inn by Radisson Vilnius Airport
description: Set in Vilnius, 5.5 km from Bastion of the Vilnius Defensive Wall, Park Inn by Radisson Vilnius Airport Hotel & Conference Centre offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Some units at the property feature a terrace with a city view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Park Inn by Radisson Vilnius Airport Hotel & Conference Centre all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at Park Inn by Radisson Vilnius Airport Hotel & Conference Centre will be able to enjoy activities in and around Vilnius, like skiing. Museum of Occupations and Freedom Fights is 5.8 km from the hotel, while Lithuanian National Opera and Ballet Theatre is 6.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vilnius International Airport, 1 km from Park Inn by Radisson Vilnius Airport Hotel & Conference Centre.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Lietuva, Vilnius
description: The elegant 4-star Radisson Blu Hotel Lietuva is located on the banks of the River Neris in the centre of Vilnius. It offers on-site parking, spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi, and a fitness centre. All rooms at the Hotel Lietuva are air-conditioned and decorated with warm colours. Each comes with a multi-channel LCD TV, a safe and a minibar. All have a modern bathroom with cosmetic mirrors and free toiletries. The hotel’s Riverside restaurant serves a varied breakfast buffet and a selection of international and Scandinavian dishes. Guests can visit the Skybar, located on the 22nd floor and offering views of the Old Town. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange car rental or laundry services. Guests can relax in the sauna or try a selection of available massage treatments. Radisson Blu Hotel Lietuva is situated 9 km away from Vilnius International Airport. The city’s beautiful Old Town is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Pacai
description: Located in Vilnius Old Town Hotel Pacai, Vilnius, a Member of Design Hotels is a 5-star design hotel, set in a Baroque palace dating back to 1677. The property underwent complete renovation in 2018 and now boasts it's historical heritage, offering guests an on-site restaurant, bar and wellness centre. All the air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Pacai, Vilnius, a Member of Design Hotels are equipped with a flat-screen TV and coffee making facilities. The private bathrooms are done in marble and feature either a bath or shower. Free toiletries, bathrobes and slippers are offered to guests. All rooms feature a unique design, revealing the historical interior of the property. In summer the inner courtyard of the hotel features outdoor seating. A buffet breakfast is served at the property daily. Other facilities of Hotel Pacai, Vilnius, a Member of Design Hotels include a fitness centre that is open around the clock. A sauna and hammam is available to guests, and a variety of massages and beauty treatments can be booked at surcharge. Hotel Pacai, Vilnius, a Member of Design Hotels boasts a central location, with most landmarks, restaurants and shops being located within a walking distance. Vilnius International Airport is located within 7 km from the hotel.

name: Stikliai Hotel
description: The luxurious Relais & Châteaux Stikliai Hotel is housed in a historic building with Baroque and Gothic features and located in the centre of Vilnius Old Town. It features individually designed rooms with antique furniture and air conditioning. All elegant rooms at the Stikliai are decorated with high quality fabrics, furniture and accessories. Each comes with free internet, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a seating area. All have a minibar and a safe. Bathrooms come with bath and shower, free toiletries, bathrobes and slippers. There is a Spa Centre with a sauna, a swimming pool, a gym and a treatment room. Guests can also enjoy a Cocktail and a Lobby bar. Front desks staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange concierge services, assist with luggage storage or provide ticket service. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. The on-site Stikliai Café serves light meals, cakes and coffee. Relais & Châteaux Stikliai Hotel is situated 200 metres from the Vilnius University, the oldest one in the Baltics. The Cathedral Square is only 500 metres away.

name: Artis Centrum Hotels
description: Located in the centre of Vilnius’ Old Town, Artis Centrum Hotels is set in a renovated building from the 19th century. Elegant, air-conditioned rooms are on offer. All rooms at the Artis are elegantly furnished. Guests can enjoy views of the Old Town and of Gediminas Tower. Satellite TV and free access to WiFi are also provided. Breakfast and lunch are served in the La Traviata restaurant. The second restaurant and bar, Adelia, offers a selection of European dishes and drinks. In the spa centre massages, beauty treatments, manicure and pedicure are available at a surcharge. The use of a fitness room is free for hotel's guests. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day. Artis Centrum Hotels is situated within walking distance of all major sights. Vilnius International Airport is 7 km away, the main train and bus station 2 km.

name: Novotel Vilnius Centre
description: Settle in to 4-star city-centre comfort at Novotel Vilnius Centre hotel, a few minutes' walk from the cathedral and the old town. We are perfect for you to explore our great capital properly. We offer 159 well-appointed rooms with all the space you need. Contemporary decor, light colors and lots of natural light make your room a tranquil haven. The lavish hot breakfast buffet in the sunny first-floor restaurant gets you fueled up for the day ahead at Novotel.accorhotels.com

name: Grata by Centrum Hotels
description: The 3-star Grata by Centrum Hotels front desk is open from 7AM till 3AM every day. It features rooms with free Wifi. All rooms at the Grata by Centrum Hotels are classically furnished and decorated with warm tones. Each comes with tea and coffee-making facilities and a work desk. Front desk staff is available from 7:00AM to 3:00AM every day and can assist with luggage storage and laundry services. Shuttle services can be arranged. Monitored parking in a garage is possible on availability. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel restaurant. Guests can enjoy a drink at summer garden or lobby fromthe self service bar at the reception. Grata by Centrum Hotels is situated 1 km from the Vingis Park and many popular clubs and shops. Vilnius International Airport is only 6 km away.

name: Hotel Congress
description: The 4-star Hotel Congress is located in a 19th-century building, 650 metres from the Old Town Vilnius. It features rooms with individually controlled air conditioning, free WiFi, a minibar and a safe. All rooms at the Congress are classically furnished and decorated with warm tones and wooden features. Each comes with satellite TV and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Guests can exercise in the fitness centre or try a selection of available massage treatments in a parlour nearby. Front desk staff is available 24 hours and can assist with luggage storage. There is limited parking available. A varied buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s elegant restaurant, which offers a variety of European dishes. There is also an on-site bar with drinks and snacks. Hotel Congress is located within a 10-minute walk of the Vilnius Cathedral. The Vilnius Castle Complex and the Gediminas’ Tower are 800 metres away.

name: St Palace Hotel
description: St Palace Hotel is situated in Vilnius’s Old Town, 150 metres from the Gate of Dawn. The property offers rooms with TV sets with satellite channels and free Wi-Fi. The rooms of the St Palace Hotel are air-conditioned, and feature tea and coffee facilities and work area with a desk. Each has a minibar and private bathroom with a hairdryer and floor heating. Private parking is also available at the property. The hotel is surrounded by art galleries, antique shops, boutiques, restaurants and bars. The Town Hall is within 260 metres, and the Vilnius Railway Station is within 750 metres.

name: Art City Inn
description: This 3-star hotel is located in the centre of Vilnius. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and a minibar. It also features free WiFi in the entire hotel and private parking. The Art City Inn rooms are spacious and have a classic interior design. Each has a work desk, radio and carpeted floor. Each private bathroom includes toiletries and a hairdryer. The Art City Inn staff is available 24 hours a day and provides tourist information. Guests can rent a bike or car directly at the hotel. It also boasts a sauna, fitness room, and an art gallery. Gediminas Avenue, the main street of Vilnius, is only 200 metres away. The Old Town is within a 20-minute walking distance. Lukiškės Square is 500 metres from the Art City Inn. The hotel's restaurant, Perfect, serves international and traditional Lithuanian dishes for lunch and dinner. The breakfast buffet is also served there. The bar is open daily until midnight.

name: Downtown Forest Hostel & Camping
description: No description found

name: City Hotels Algirdas
description: City Hotels Algirdas is situated in a quiet street of the New Town of Vilnius, just 500 metres from the Old Town and within walking distance from the shopping and business areas. It offers free Wi-Fi in all areas. City Hotels Algirdas offers light, Scandinavian style rooms and natural toned rooms with a TV with satellite channels, a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel is 1.2 km from the Central Train Station. The Vilna Gaon Jewish State Museum is within 450 metres.

name: Park Villa
description: Park Villa can be found on the beach of Neris River in the prestigious district, just a 10-minute drive from Old Town of Vilnius. The property is situated 3 km from the Aquapark Vichy and Siemens Arena, as well as Akropolis, Outlet Park and Ozas Shopping and Entertainment Centres. HoteI offers a spa area, fine cuisine and free WiFi. Free private parking is available. All rooms in the Park Villa hotel a private bathroom and some offer a balcony. Amenities include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels in various languages and a minibar, as well as a laptop safe. The Valakupiai Beach is 100 metres away. A basketball field, football pitch and volleyball field available in the area. There are spa facilities on site with a discount in the morning hours. International cuisine and Lithuanian specialities, as well as a wide range of quality wines from Italy, Spain and France, are served in the restaurant. Property is situated 2 km from Grybo Diagnostic Clinic, Baltic-American Clinic, Vitkus Plastic Surgery Clinic and Labas entertainment park. Park Villa is situated 13,5 km from Vilnius International Airport.

name: Calvary Hotel & Restaurant Vilnius
description: Located in Vilnius, 1.3 km from Lithuanian National Opera and Ballet Theatre, CALVARY Hotel & Restaurant Vilnius features accommodation with a restaurant, private parking and a bar. The property is around 2.4 km from Gediminas' Tower, 4.4 km from Bastion of the Vilnius Defensive Wall and 7.5 km from Lithuanian Exhibition and Convention Centre LITEXPO. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near CALVARY Hotel & Restaurant Vilnius include Museum of Occupations and Freedom Fights, Money Museum of the Bank of Lithuania and Vilnius Museum of Applied Arts and Design. The nearest airport is Vilnius International Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Park Hotel Vilnius
description: Park Hotel Vilnius is situated in the Vilnius Old Town district. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and terrace. Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Park Hotel Vilnius features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a paid underground parking (limited number of places) so you need to reserve it in advance. Museum of Genocide Victims is 900 metres away, Lithuanian National Opera and Ballet Theatre is 1 km from Park Hotel Vilnius, while Gediminas' Tower is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Vilnius Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Villa Alicante & Spa
description: Situated on the western outskirts of Vilnius, Villa Alicante offers a quiet and idyllic location on the shores of Gilužis Lake, yet is only a few minutes from the city centre. The air-conditioned apartments are all very comfortable and individually designed in Scandinavian style. Most of the apartments offer fascinating views of the lake. There is also a terrace directly on the lake. Villa Alicante’s spa centre comprises a sauna, a spa bath and an indoor pool. Relaxing massages are also offered.

name: Jeruzale Hotel
description: The family-run Jeruzale Hotel is located in a quiet area of Vilnius, 4 km from the city centre. It features an indoor pool, a sauna and rooms with free internet and cable TV. All rooms at the Jeruzale are simply furnished and decorated with warm tones. Each comes with a private bathroom with either bath or shower. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. There is also an on-site coffee bar offering a selection of drinks. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day. Free monitored parking is also provided. Jeruzale Hotel is located 100 metres from the popular Jeruzale Park with over 30 different chapels. The historic Old Town is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Jimmy Jumps House
description: Jimmy Jumps House is located in the Vilnius Old Town. It offers free Wi-Fi access and hot waffles for breakfast. The hostel can also organise tours. The rooms are simply furnished and decorated in bright colours. Some come with private bathrooms. Guests have access to a shared kitchen. At Jimmy Jumps House you will find a 24-hour front desk and a terrace. Other facilities offered include luggage storage. The hostel is 900 metres from the Gediminas Tower and 850 metres from the Vilnius Cathedral. The River Neris is 1.2 km away, and the Vilnius International Airport is 6.5 km from the property. Please note: We do not accept bookings for groups of males of 5 or more, or groups of any size of 8 or more without prior written confirmation. This is a backpacker hostel and not a stag party/group party hostel. Thank you for understanding!

name: Mamos Virtuve
address: Uzubaliu g. 3, Uzubaliai, Avizieniu Sen., Vilniaus r., Vilnius 14180
description: Situated 11 km from the Vilnius city centre, Mamos virtuve guesthouse enjoys a convenient location only 500 metres from the A2 motorway exit. It offers free Wi-Fi and free parking. Guests can start the day with a hearty breakfast in the on-site café or on the terrace. All comfortably furnished rooms of the Mamos virtuve provide a bathroom, extra long beds and cable TV. Some also feature flat-screen TVs. Guests of the Mamos virtuve can benefit from the on-site sauna.

name: Velga
description: A 10-minute drive from the Old Town and Vilnius Airport, Hotel Velga features a restaurant and modern rooms with cable TV and a work desk. Free private parking and WiFi are available. A variety of Lithuanian and international cuisine is served in Velga Hotel’s restaurant. There is a bus stop 130 metres away from the Velga Hotel. The Vilnius Train and Bus Station can be reached in a 10-minute drive. The Litexpo Exhibition Centre and Vingis Park are about 1 km away. The TV Tower is 4 km away from Hotel Velga.

name: Gabi B&B
description: Situated in Vilnius, 300 metres from the centre and less than 1 km from Gediminas' Tower, Gabi B&B features accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Gabi B&B you will find a restaurant serving European cuisine. The accommodation offers a terrace. Gabi B&B provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Bastion of the Vilnius Defensive Wall, Lithuanian National Opera and Ballet Theatre and Museum of Occupations and Freedom Fights. The nearest airport is Vilnius International, 7 km from Gabi B&B, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
